if self.args.device == 'ibm' or self.args.device == 'all':
    shots = 5
    dev1 = ProjectQIBMBackend(wires=self.num_subsystems, shots=shots,
        use_hardware=False, token=token, verbose=True)
    self.assertEqual(shots, dev1.shots)
    dev2 = ProjectQIBMBackend(wires=self.num_subsystems, num_runs=shots,
        use_hardware=False, token=token)
    self.assertEqual(shots, dev2.shots)
    dev2 = ProjectQIBMBackend(wires=self.num_subsystems, shots=shots + 2,
        num_runs=shots, use_hardware=False, token=token)
    self.assertEqual(shots, dev2.shots)
